thread.title: BRIEF-Sohar Poultry Says CMA Approves Co's Conversion To Close Joint Stock Company

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sohar Poultry Says CMA Approves Co's Conversion To Close Joint Stock Company

organizations.name: conversion to close joint stock company
brief-sohar poultry says cma approves co

text:
May 6 (Reuters) - SOHAR POULTRY CO:
* CMA GIVES PRELIMINARY APPROVAL FOR CONVERSION OF CO FROM PUBLIC LISTED JOINT STOCK COMPANY TO A CLOSE JOINT STOCK COMPANY
* CMA APPROVES SHAREHOLDER ATYAB IFFCO POULTRY TO PURCHASE SHARES OF COâ€™S MINORITY SHAREHOLDERS
* MAJOR SHAREHOLDER ATYAB IFFCO POULTRY L.L.C PROPOSES TO PURCHASE SHARES FOR A VALUE OF 787 BZS PER SHARE Source:( bit.ly/2jxy0Eb ) Further company coverage:
